Summary: acsending disk waving back and forth above the low lying clouds
divs: Sighting DetailsMy girlfriend and I were traveling across town (Syracuse, NY) to dine at a restaurant, Twin Trees in Solvay around 3pm. She was driving and I was watching the skies. I always watch the sky. As we were getting close to Milton Ave., in Solvay, I noticed a weird shaped object just above the cumulus clouds. It was a disk shape and quite a distance away, approximately 2000~3000 feet high. I then told her to pull over in a parking lot. I had to get out of the car. I watched it flop back and forth while it descended and ascended higher and higher. It was like a roller coaster pattern. This thing had to be big! It was as big as an aspirin and dark in color. I did see a reflected area of the craft momentarily as it waffled back and forth. I watched this strange event for about 5 minutes as it disappeared out of my line of sight. My girlfriend did not see a thing. She thinks that I am crazy. This is not the first time for me. 2 years ago I had a close encounter (2) with 3 rectangle shapes just above the road from which I was traveling on. That was nuts and I was scared!
trends: There have been no other sightings in Solvay
This sighting has never been favorited.
